column4: i have an emergency and i need to capture the memory from firefox right now
firefox is crashing and i need to recover a wav file it is storing in memory
well i was using the hobnox audiotool
unfortunately, they didnt do a good job of their save function
it is supposed to encode to ogg then upload but sometimes it is broken
so i was recording it to another laptop
there's only 25k in /tmp... where else would firefox/flash10 store a huge audio file?
where does firefox store its temp files?
there's nothing that big in there
-> well if not there look somewhere in you ~/.mozilla  or ~/firefox i fyou have this dir
-> would that make sense from security standpoint?
